sentences.en: A gas tends to expand indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 气体具有无限膨胀的趋势.

sentences.en: As your horizons expand, these new ideas can give a whole new meaning to life.
sentences.cn: 随着眼界不断开阔，这些新观念会为生活赋予全新的意义。

sentences.en: China will further expand the scope of its opened - up areas.
sentences.cn: 中国要进一步扩大开放范围.

sentences.en: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.cn: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.en: his expanding waistline
sentences.cn: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

sentences.en: His success emboldened him to expand his business.
sentences.cn: 他有了成就因而激发他进一步扩展业务.

sentences.en: I owned a bookshop and desired to expand the business.
sentences.cn: 我拥有一家书店，想要扩大业务。

sentences.en: I will expand on this problem next time.
sentences.cn: 我下次再详细谈这个问题.

sentences.en: Metals expand when they are heated.
sentences.cn: 金属受热会膨胀。

sentences.en: Metals expand when they are heated.
sentences.cn: 金属受了热就会膨胀.

sentences.en: Objects expand when heated and contract when cooled.
sentences.cn: 物体热则涨,冷则缩.

sentences.en: Substances have no tendency to expand unless ( they are ) heated.
sentences.cn: 除非 受热,物质不会有膨胀的倾向.

sentences.en: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.en: The computer industry has expanded greatly over the last decade.
sentences.cn: 计算机行业在过去十年间大大地发展起来。

sentences.en: The hotel wants to expand its business by adding a swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 该酒店想添个游泳池来扩展业务。

sentences.en: The interest rate's coming down. I'll be able to expand or stay in business.
sentences.cn: 利率正在降低，我可以扩大公司或者维持经营。

sentences.en: The merchant wants to expand his business.
sentences.cn: 那个商人想扩大他的经营.

sentences.en: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 许多花瓣在阳光下开放.

sentences.en: the rapidly expanding field of information technology
sentences.cn: 迅速发展的信息技术领域

sentences.en: The ultimate aim is to expand the network further.
sentences.cn: 最终目的是为了进一步拓展该网络。

sentences.en: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.cn: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.en: When gases are heated, they expand.
sentences.cn: 气体受热会膨胀.

words.tran_cn: 宽阔；广阔的区域；苍天；膨胀扩张
扩张主义；扩张政策；膨胀主义
领土扩张论者；扩张主义者
扩大性；膨胀系数；可膨胀性

phrases.tran_cn: 全部展开；显示所有文件；扩展所有的

trans.tran_en: if a company, business etc expands, or if someone expands it, they open new shops, factories etc

trans.tran_cn: 膨胀； 扩大； 变大
trans.tran_en: to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger
to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger
